nodes.text: Furbogs were a trading commodity. The Besalisk cook Dexter Jettster traded furbogs during his time as a trader along the Corellian Run, where he traded them for several unusual objects including hyperdrive attenuators, Sullustan gab-rippers, silicon-pronged tack trim and a large quantity of zoochberries. One furbog was worth up to ten times its weight in zoochberries.
